trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> 구독 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> to find the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> 에서 선택한 항목을 찾을 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The items that were unselected during this event.
trans-unit.target: 이 이벤트 도중 선택이 취소된 항목입니다.

trans-unit.source: The items that were selected during this event.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs" /> class.
The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> 구독 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> to find the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> 에서 선택한 항목을 찾을 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list that contains the items that were selected.
The items that were selected since the last time the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> 이벤트가 마지막으로 발생한 이후 선택된 항목입니다.

trans-unit.source: The current object along the event's route.

Performs the proper type casting to call the type-safe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventHandler" /> delegate for the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 적절한 형식 캐스팅을 수행하여 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventHandler" /> 이벤트에 대한 형식이 안전한 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> 대리자를 호출합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> and subscribes to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: 다음 예제에서는 한 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> 구독 하 고는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged> 이벤트입니다.

trans-unit.source: It uses the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> to find the selected item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>.
trans-unit.target: 사용 하 여는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.SelectionChangedEventArgs> 에서 선택한 항목을 찾을 수는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets a list that contains the items that were unselected.
trans-unit.target: 선택이 취소된 항목을 포함하는 목록을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The items that were unselected since the last time the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> event occurred.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Selector.SelectionChanged" /> 이벤트가 마지막으로 발생한 이후 선택이 취소된 항목입니다.
